description: This file defines the main page component for a note-taking application's front-end, including UI layout, state management, and interactions for creating, editing, deleting, and viewing notes.

methods.name: Home
methods.description: Main page component wrapping the content with NotesProvider.

methods.name: HomeContent
methods.description: Contains the core logic for note selection, editing, deletion, and UI layout within the main page.

methods.name: EmptyState
methods.description: Displays placeholder UI when no note is selected, with option to create a new note.
